name: Rejected
description:
Made for the LOWREZJAM 2021. It only has a 64x64 resolution.

You are under control of a factory and need to monitor every box which will be moving on the line. Only boxes on demand can be approved, and the rest must be rejected by moving a piston on the right side of screen.

  • Use Spacebar to push the piston.
  • If you're playing on a mobile device, you can touch anywhere on screen to play.
  • There's a fullscreen button on the top-right corner of screen, too.

I hope you enjoy the game! :D
